00022 #include "dfsch/lib/cdebug.h"
00023 #include <dfsch/dfsch.h>
00024 #include <dfsch/conditions.h>
00025 #include <dfsch/introspect.h>
00026 #include <stdio.h>
00027 #include <dfsch/lib/console.h>
00028 
00029 static dfsch_object_t* debugger_env = NULL;
00030 
00031 static dfsch_object_t* debug_invoke_restart(dfsch_object_t* list,
00032                                             dfsch_object_t* args,
00033                                             dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00034   int index;
00035   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, index);
00036 
00037   dfsch_invoke_restart(dfsch_list_item(list, index), args);
00038   return NULL;
00039 }
00040 
00041 static void prettyprint_condition_fields(dfsch_object_t* fields){
00042   dfsch_object_t* i = fields;
00043   dfsch_object_t* j;
00044   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(i)){
00045     j = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(i);
00046     i = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(i);
00047     if (!DFSCH_PAIR_P(j)){
00048       return;
00049     }
00050     if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(j)) == DFSCH_SYMBOL_TYPE &&
00051         (dfsch_compare_symbol(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(j), "stack-trace") ||
00052          dfsch_compare_symbol(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(j), "message"))){
00053       continue;
00054     }
00055     fprintf(stderr, "    %s: %s\n" ,
00056             dfsch_object_2_string(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(j), 10, 1),
00057             dfsch_object_2_string(DFSCH_FAST_CDR(j), 10, 1));
00058   }
00059   
00060 }
00061 
00062 static void debug_main(dfsch_object_t* reason){
00063   dfsch_object_t* restarts = dfsch_compute_restarts();
00064   dfsch_object_t* env;
00065   dfsch_object_t* ustack = dfsch_get_trace();
00066   char buf[512];
00067   int i;
00068 
00069   if (!debugger_env){
00070     debugger_env = dfsch_make_context();
00071   }
00072 
00073   env = dfsch_new_frame(debugger_env);
00074 
00075   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "reason", reason);
00076   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "stack-trace", ustack);
00077 
00078   if (DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(reason, DFSCH_CONDITION_TYPE)){
00079     fprintf(stderr, "debugger invoked on %s:\n",
00080             DFSCH_TYPE_OF(reason)->name);
00081     fprintf(stderr,"  %s\n", 
00082             dfsch_object_2_string(dfsch_condition_field_cstr(reason,
00083                                                        "message"),
00084                             10, 0));
00085     prettyprint_condition_fields(dfsch_condition_fields(reason));
00086   } else {
00087     fprintf(stderr,"debugger invoked on:\n  %s\n", 
00088             dfsch_object_2_string(reason, 10, 1));
00089   }
00090 
00091   fprintf(stderr, "\ntrace buffer:\n%s\n", dfsch_format_trace(ustack));
00092 
00093   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "restarts", restarts);
00094   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "r", dfsch_make_primitive(debug_invoke_restart,
00095                                                    restarts));
00096 
00097   fprintf(stderr, "restarts:\n");
00098   i = 0;
00099   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(restarts)){
00100     dfsch_object_t* restart = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(restarts);
00101     fprintf(stderr, "  (r %d): [%s] %s\n",
00102             i,
00103             dfsch_object_2_string(dfsch_restart_name(restart), 1, 1),
00104             dfsch_restart_description(restart));
00105     i++;
00106     restarts = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(restarts);
00107   }
00108 
00109   dfsch_introspect_register(env);
00110   dfsch_console_run_repl(dfsch_saprintf("dbg%d> ", 
00111                                         dfsch_get_debugger_depth()), 
00112                          env);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void dfsch_cdebug_enter_debugger(dfsch_object_t* reason){
00116   debug_main(reason);
00117 }
00118 
00119 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(enter_debugger, 0){
00120   dfsch_object_t* condition;
00121   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, condition);
00122   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00123   
00124   dfsch_cdebug_enter_debugger(condition);
00125 
00126   return NULL;
00127 }
00128 
00129 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_cdebug_get_procedure(){
00130   return DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(enter_debugger);
00131 }
00132 void dfsch_cdebug_set_as_debugger(){
00133   dfsch_set_debugger(dfsch_cdebug_get_procedure());
00134 }
